TestDescription.name: WordPress plugin Custom Contact Forms critical vulnerability
TestDescription.Description: Marc-Alexandre Montpas reported a security issue in the popular WordPress plugin Custom Contact Forms that would allow a user with no administrative privileges to download and modify your database remotely (no authentication required).
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can download and modify your database remotely.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of Custom Contact Forms (this problem was fixed in version 5.1.0.4).

Reference.database: Critical Vulnerability Disclosed on WordPress Custom Contact Forms Plugin
